input_text:
Job Title: Groundskeeper #41910

Location: Virginia Beach, VA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Customer Service, Other, Production

Description:
Work with the best - work for Virginia Beach Parks and Recreation! Join our team and contribute to our 60+ year track record of providing legendary experiences! We are dedicated to promoting healthy lifestyles and protecting our environment. We ensure all residents – regardless of their physical, social, and economic circumstances – can access our programs. By providing enriching and memorable lifelong experiences, we strive to enhance the quality of life for our community by improving the physical and mental well-being of our residents.
*The salary for this position is $15.33 per hour/$31,886.40 annually.
GROUNDSKEEPER I duties and responsibilities include, but are not limited to:Individual will perform landscape and grounds maintenance services for parks, building sites ,roadways, school sites, athletic fields, resort area, and the Municipal Center.Operate a variety of lawn mowers (including commercial type) and other motorized equipmentOperate handheld power tools such as weed-eaters, edging and trimming equipmentUse common gardening and hand toolsCollect and dispose of trash and debrisLoad and unload tools, equipment, dirt, gravel, clay, and sand for project assignmentsRegularly lift/carry 50 lbs. and occasionally lift/carry 50+ lbs.Work independently and/or with as part of a teamAssist in installing, mulching, maintaining and weeding plant and shrub beds, lawn areas, turf, and walkwaysPrune, fertilize, spray herbicides, apply pesticides, etc.Plant InstallationPlant & Tree PruningAthletic Field Maintenance
**Work is performed outside in all weather conditions including temperature extremes.Full Time Perks –
Employees who are new to the Virginia Retirement System are eligible for:11 Paid Holidays plus 3 Additional Personal Holidays18 Days of Paid Time Off (PTO)Medical, Dental, Vision, and Prescription CoverageLegal and Identity Theft ProtectionVirginia Retirement System (VRS) Hybrid Retirement Plan & Basic Life InsuranceCommonwealth of Virginia 457 Deferred Compensation Plan(COV457)Hybrid 457 Cash MatchVirginia Local Disability Program (VLDP) – Income Replacement(Short-Term Disability, Long-Term Disability, and Long-Term Care)Optional Life InsuranceWellness ProgramsEmployee Assistance Program / Work-Life ServicesPaid Maternity/Paternity/Parental Care Leave
The City of Virginia Beach is an Equal Opportunity Employer.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

output_json.title: Groundskeeper #41910
output_json.summary: Join Virginia Beach Parks and Recreation and contribute to enhancing community quality of life through landscape and grounds maintenance.
job_responsibilities: Perform landscape and grounds maintenance services
Operate various lawn mowers and motorized equipment
Collect and dispose of trash and debris
Load and unload tools, equipment, materials
Regularly lift/carry 50 lbs. and occasionally lift/carry 50+ lbs.
Work independently and/or as part of a team
Assist in plant installation, mulching, and weeding
Prune, fertilize, spray herbicides, apply pesticides
output_json.physical_requirements: Work is performed outside in all weather conditions including temperature extremes. Regularly lift/carry 50 lbs. and occasionally lift/carry 50+ lbs.
benefits: 11 Paid Holidays plus 3 Additional Personal Holidays
Medical, Dental, Vision, and Prescription Coverage
Virginia Retirement System (VRS) Hybrid Retirement Plan & Basic Life Insurance
Commonwealth of Virginia 457 Deferred Compensation Plan (COV457)
Virginia Local Disability Program (VLDP) – Income Replacement (Short-Term Disability, Long-Term Disability, and Long-Term Care)
output_json.equal_opportunity_policy: The City of Virginia Beach is an Equal Opportunity Employer.
